name: TMDB Trailers (Bundled yt-dlp)
description: Downloads movie trailers from TMDB with bundled yt-dlp - no external dependencies required
overview: This plugin automatically searches for and downloads movie trailers from The Movie Database (TMDB) API. **BUNDLED VERSION** includes yt-dlp binaries for all platforms (Linux, FreeBSD, macOS, Windows) - perfect for TrueNAS, Docker, and restricted environments. No additional software installation required. Features configurable quality settings, automatic organization, scheduled processing, and cross-platform compatibility.

versions.changelog: BUNDLED VERSION: Includes yt-dlp binaries for all platforms. No external yt-dlp installation required. Perfect for TrueNAS, Docker, and restricted environments. Automatic platform detection and fallback support.
